Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Organic Chemical/Lipid/Terpene Compound/Taxane Compound/TPI 287,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Antimitotic Agent/Tubulin Binding Agent/Taxane-Pocket Binding Agent/TPI 287
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic, third generation taxane with potential antineoplastic activity. TPI 287 binds to tubulin and stabilizes microtubules, resulting in inhibition of microtubule assembly/disassembly dynamics, cell cycle arrest at the G2/M phase, and apoptosis.
